# iosxr_object_tracking (Resource)

This resource can manage the Object Tracking configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_object_tracking" "example" {
  track_name                  = "TRACK1"
  delay_up                    = 10
  delay_down                  = 5
  route_address_prefix        = "2001:db8::"
  route_address_prefix_length = 64
  route_vrf                   = "VRF1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `track_name` (String) track name

### Optional

- `bfd_debounce` (Number) Debounce count
  - Range: `1`-`10`
- `bfd_destination_address` (String) Destination Ip Address to track via bfd
- `bfd_interface` (String) The link on rc to be used to track
- `bfd_rate` (Number) Tx interval in ms
  - Range: `1`-`5000`
- `bgp_neighbor_ipv4_labeled_unicast_address` (String) Neighbor address
- `bgp_neighbor_ipv4_labeled_unicast_disable_fib_check` (Boolean) Disable Fib chcking
- `bgp_neighbor_ipv4_labeled_unicast_vrf_name` (String) Vrf name
- `bgp_neighbor_ipv4_unicast_address` (String) Neighbor address
- `bgp_neighbor_ipv4_unicast_disable_fib_check` (Boolean) Disable Fib chcking
- `bgp_neighbor_ipv4_unicast_vrf_name` (String) Vrf name
- `bgp_neighbor_ipv6_labeled_unicast_address` (String) Neighbor address
- `bgp_neighbor_ipv6_labeled_unicast_disable_fib_check` (Boolean) Disable Fib chcking
- `bgp_neighbor_ipv6_unicast_address` (String) Neighbor address
- `bgp_neighbor_ipv6_unicast_disable_fib_check` (Boolean) Disable Fib chcking
- `bgp_neighbor_ipv6_unicast_vrf_name` (String) Vrf name
- `bgp_neighbor_vpnv4_unicast_address` (String) Neighbor address
- `bgp_neighbor_vpnv4_unicast_disable_fib_check` (Boolean) Disable Fib chcking
- `bgp_neighbor_vpnv6_unicast_address` (String) Neighbor address
- `bgp_neighbor_vpnv6_unicast_disable_fib_check` (Boolean) Disable Fib chcking
- `boolean_and_list` (Attributes List) Set track object (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--boolean_and_list))
- `boolean_or_list` (Attributes List) Set track object (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--boolean_or_list))
- `delay_down` (Number) Down time
  - Range: `1`-`3600`
- `delay_up` (Number) Up time
  - Range: `1`-`3600`
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `line_protocol_boolean_and` (Attributes List) List member interface (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--line_protocol_boolean_and))
- `line_protocol_boolean_or` (Attributes List) List member interface (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--line_protocol_boolean_or))
- `line_protocol_percentage` (Attributes List) List member interface (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--line_protocol_percentage))
- `line_protocol_percentage_down` (Number) Threshold limit at which track is set to DOWN state
  - Range: `1`-`100`
- `line_protocol_percentage_up` (Number) Threshold limit at which track is set to UP state
  - Range: `1`-`100`
- `line_protocol_state` (String) Set track interface
- `line_protocol_weight` (Attributes List) List member interface (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--line_protocol_weight))
- `line_protocol_weight_down` (Number) Threshold limit at which track is set to DOWN state
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`
- `line_protocol_weight_up` (Number) Threshold limit at which track is set to UP state
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`
- `route_address_prefix` (String) Network address
- `route_address_prefix_length` (Number) Masklength
  - Range: `1`-`128`
- `route_ipv4_address` (String) Network address
- `route_ipv4_mask` (String) Network mask
- `route_vrf` (String) specify vrf
- `rtr` (Number) track type ipsla
  - Range: `1`-`2048`
- `threshold_percentage` (Attributes List) Set track object (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--threshold_percentage))
- `threshold_percentage_down` (Number) Threshold limit at which track is set to DOWN state
  - Range: `1`-`100`
- `threshold_percentage_up` (Number) Threshold limit at which track is set to UP state
  - Range: `1`-`100`
- `threshold_weight` (Attributes List) Set track object (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--threshold_weight))
- `threshold_weight_down` (Number) Threshold limit at which track is set to DOWN state
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`
- `threshold_weight_up` (Number) Threshold limit at which track is set to UP state
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`
- `track_down_error_disable_interfaces` (Attributes List) Interface to be disabled (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--track_down_error_disable_interfaces))
- `track_up_error_disable_interfaces` (Attributes List) Interface to be disabled (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--track_up_error_disable_interfaces))

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_object_tracking.example "<track_name>"
```
